title: Arsenal star Granit Xhaka to face no further action over racial abuse allegation after row with Heathrow airport worker
text:
EFL XHAKA IN CLEAR Arsenal star Granit Xhaka to face no further action over racial abuse allegation after row with Heathrow airport worker 
Xhaka denied that he branded a staffer a “f g white b***h” Breaking Comments GRANIT XHAKA will face NO further action over his alleged racist comments to a Heathrow airport worker. 
The Arsenal star denied that he branded a staffer a “f g white b***h”. Getty Images 8 Arsene Wenger hauled in Granit Xhaka for showdown talks 
The £30million Swiss ace was hauled in for showdown talks with boss Arsene Wenger after being interviewed under caution in a police station. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Arsenal news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
Xhaka was accused of racially abusing a member of British Airways’ check-in staff just a day after his red card in a 2-1 home win over Burnley . 
The row is claimed to have kicked off as Xhaka said goodbye to footballer pal Leonard Lekaj at Heathrow’s Terminal 5. 
Lekaj, who plays for German sixth division side FC Monchengladbach, is said to have been stopped from boarding a flight on Monday evening after missing check-in deadline. AP:Associated Press Granit Xhaka was also sent off in the game against Swansea earlier this year Granit Xhaka gets two yellow cards against Swansea and is sent off again Granit Xhaka sent off for Arsenal against Burnley after two footed tackle Instagram Granit Xhaka poses with his girlfriend on social media 
Midfielder Xhaka, 24, allegedly became angry and verbally abused the BA worker. 
He is accused of labelling one worker a "f g white b***h" in German which another employee claims to have overheard. 
Cops were called before Xhaka was voluntarily taken to a police station for questioning. No allegations were made against Lekaj, 26, who is understood to be related to Xhaka’s fiancee Leonita Lekaj. 
Xhaka was already faced a reprimand from Wenger over his discipline. 
The red card against the Clarets was his second this season after being sent off against Swansea in October. Instagram: Granit Xhaka Granit Xhaka out for dinner with his fiancee and a friend Instagram: Granit Xhaka 8 Granit Xhaka poses for a selfie with his girlfriend and family
